description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.ja: Boku wa Isekai de Fuyo Mahou to Shoukan Mahou wo Tenbin ni Kakeru

altTitles.ja: ぼくは異世界で付与魔法と召喚魔法を天秤にかける

altTitles.en: Another World Survival: Min-maxing my Support and Summoning Magic

altTitles.id: Menyeimbangkan Sihir Pendukungku dan Sihir Pemanggilan Di Dunia lain

altTitles.en: Balancing My Support Magic and Summoning Magic In A Different World

description.en:
Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking, Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However, right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge, a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware, all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa’s excitement is short-lived, however, as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque, pig-looking monster, and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.

Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal, Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That’s not going to be as easy as it seems, however, as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess…

(Hanashi Media)

[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/another-world-survival/)
description.id: suatu hari. di sekolah swasta tertentu dengan asrama, seluruh sekolah dipindahkan ke dunia lain. aku, Kaya Kazuhisa. dari kelas 1 SMA. telah diintimidasi untuk waktu yang lama. untuk membunuh pelakunya yang telah menggangguku, aku menggali jebakan. tapi tiba-tiba aku membunuh monster. sejak saat itu. aku telah berevolusi menjadi keberadaan langka yang dapat melawan monster. di hari yang sama, aku menyelamatkan seorang gadis dari kelas 3 sekolah menengah, Shimozono Arisu di hutan dari orc. ketika aku bekerja dengan arisu untuk mengalahkan orc, dan secara bertahap naik aku level. aku dipaksa untuk membuat pilihan. haruskah aku memilih sihir pemanggilan yang cocok untuk bertahan hidup sendirian? atau aku harus pilih sihir pendukung yang digunakan saat bertarung bersama dengannya?
description.ja:
高等部1年生でいじめられっ子の賀谷和久（かや・かずひさ）は森の中、いじめの主犯格を殺すための落とし穴を掘っていた。だが数分後、その穴に落とし殺害することができたのは──!?　RPGのような異世界の山中へとまるごと転移した全寮制の学園のなか、スキルという名の“ちから”を得た和久。彼は自分ひとり生き抜くために最適な【召喚魔法】か、それとも少女たちを戦わせるための【付与魔法】か……天秤にかける。

獰猛なモンスターたちによる凌辱の危機が迫るなか、主人公と少女たちは果たして生き残れるのか……!?

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスタースペシャル

description.en:
Pokémon Adventures follows the story of the original Game Boy game, with all the Gym Leaders, places and opponents. There's plenty of action as these trainers explore forests, jungles, cities and caves in search of Pokémon and adventure… sometimes working together, sometimes on their own! But can they foil the schemes of Team Rocket, a mysterious group of villains who want to use Pokémon for evil?  
  
Volume 1 Chapter 1 - Volume 3 Chapter 40 - Red, Green & Blue chapter

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.vi: Nayu, đại phù thủy thiên tài vĩ đại đã hết mana và phải nương nhờ nhà main, một học sinh cũ của cổ...TÌNH CỜ thay main lại thích vị đài phù thủy thiên tài vĩ đại ấy và không lỡ làm ngơ cô ấy cho dù cô ấy rất ngỗ ngược...
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.ja: キラキラしても、しなくても

description.en: Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However, his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate, bittersweet story of adolescence.
description.ja: キラキラした恋、だけじゃない。高校生の慶太は、友だちの正人のことが好き。しかし、BLでよく見るようなキラキラした恋と自分の恋は、似ても似つかなくてーー。ほろ苦く繊細な、青い春の物語。
description.es-la: Un amor deslumbrante no es el único tipo que hay. Keita es un estudiante de preparatoria al que le gusta su amigo Masato. Sin embargo, su amor no está ni cerca de ser como los amores deslumbrantes que se ven seguido en los BL… Esta es una historia agridulce y delicada de la adolescencia.

description.en:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59079)
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

altTitles.en: Wise Man Is Summoned to Another World ~The Strongest Items Were Those Less Desired in Inventory~

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

title.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

description.en:
While her friends are interested in cute cafés and getting boyfriends, Yanagi Riku finds it hard to talk about what she actually likes. They also think that her interest in the hot but unsociable Fushimi-kun is in bad taste, but she actually has a crush on him. One day, instead of accompanying her friends to the popular new café they found, she secretly seeks out an old café in order to indulge in her own interests: old-fashioned things!  
  
When the person at the counter turns around, she finds out that it is Fushimi-kun! He actually invites her to talk and they find out that they have similar tastes, and promise to talk again, but the next day he's unsociable as ever.
description.pt:
O Mangá fala sobre uma garota que gosta de coisas retro e um garoto que é bartender em uma cafeteria retro.  
  


---
description.ru: Я нашла место, где могу быть собой… Обычная старшеклассница с необычными увлечениями – Янаги Рику, любительница классических кофеен, всего старинного и элегантного, не могла ни с кем поделиться своим хобби. Но однажды, заглянув в кофейню Анэмоне, она обнаруживает там одноклассника, который был ей интересен – Фушими Эйто?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
description.vi:
Truyện kể về thời kỳ Tam quốc tranh bá nổi tiếng trong lịch sử Trung Quốc. Điểm đặc biệt ở đây là nhân vật trung tâm của truyện không phải là Tào Tháo, Lưu Bị hay Tôn Quyền như ta thường thấy ở các bộ truyện nói về thời kì này mà là Tư Mã Ý - người mà sau này đã cùng với gia tộc mình đánh bại tất cả các anh hùng khác, gom thiên hạ về thành 1 mối, chấm dứt 1 thời kỳ dài loạn lạc. 

Truyện mở đầu bằng cơn ác mộng mà Tư Mã Ý vẫn thường gặp: 1 người đàn ông trên ngai vàng phế truất ngôi vị của hoàng đế, bên ngoài bất chấp đám đông binh lính bao vây tấn công cùng bao nhiêu thương tích mà 1 người bình thường không thể chịu đựng nổi, tên tù vượt ngục vẫn bước từng bước từng bước một vào điện đòi món nợ máu với người đàn ông đó. Đó chỉ là cơn ác mộng hay là 1 điềm báo? Không ai nói được kể cả Tư Mã Ý.

Nhưng cũng có ai có thời gian để quan tâm đến truyện ấy trong thời loạn lạc này chứ. Dù cố né tránh, cuối cùng dòng họ Tư Mã cũng phải bước vào vòng xoáy chiến tranh, và sự xuất hiện của họ đã làm thay đổi cả dòng lịch sử....

altTitles.es-la: Una novela gráfica en serie: ¡Drama Matutino!

altTitles.ja: 連続漫画小説 あさドラ!

description.en: In 2020, a large creature rampages through Tokyo, destroying everything in its path. In 1959, Asa Asada, a spunky young girl from a huge family in Nagoya, is kidnapped for ransom—and not a soul notices. When a typhoon hits Nagoya, Asa and her kidnapper must work together to survive. But there’s more to her kidnapper and this storm than meets the eye.
description.es-la: En 2020, una gran criatura arrasa Tokio, destruyendo todo a su paso. En 1959, Asa Asada, una valiente joven de una gran familia de Nagoya, es secuestrada para pedir un rescate y nadie se da cuenta. Cuando un tifón golpea Nagoya, Asa y su secuestrador deben trabajar juntos para sobrevivir. Pero el secuestrador y la tormenta son más de lo que parece.
description.pt-br: Em 2020, uma grande criatura invade Tóquio, destruindo tudo em seu caminho. Em 1959, Asa Asada, uma jovem corajosa de uma família enorme em Nagoya, é sequestrada por resgate – e nem uma alma percebe. Quando um tufão atinge Nagoya, Asa e seu sequestrador devem trabalhar juntos para sobreviver. Mas há mais em seu sequestrador e nesta tempestade do que aparenta.

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

description.en:
Seo MoonYeob was the world’s greatest superhuman, who sacrificed himself after saving humanity.

Thought to have been dead, he returns 17 years later to a now-peaceful world,
and the superhuman sport faces seismic change.

The story of a modern-fantasy sports-action starts now!
description.ko:
인류를 구하고 홀로 희생한 영웅, 최강의 초인 서문엽.
죽었다고 알려진 그가 17년 후의 평화로운 세상에 돌연 귀환하면서
초인들의 스포츠 <배틀필드>에는 지각변동이 일어나기 시작한다.

본격 현대 판타지 X 스포츠 X 액션!

description.en: Shogo Ban is now a chef at Ristorante Legare. As the Yokohama branch of the Trattoria Baccanale he used to work at, he has been entrusted with the responsibility of head of the pasta section. Rejoin Ban as he struggles to meet the expectations of work and develop his personal relationships.

A genius actress has just awoken!!   
  
Suzuki Hikaru, Hoshino Sayaka, Ito Chihiro and Suzuki Shinobu are all new students who have just entered the same middle school. Sayaka is a shy girl who secretly loves acting. Hikaru is an energetic boy who loves basketball. Incidentally, he shares the same first name with Shinobu, a popular rich boy who would be perfect if not for his rotten personality. Chihiro is Hikaru’s childhood friend and has long had a crush on him.   
  
On the day of the opening ceremony, Hikaru happens to witness Sayaka acting out the lines of a drama on the rooftop and is instantly captivated. Upon seeing Hikaru getting along with Sayaka, Chihiro’s chest begins to ache. When Shinobu sees this, he is overcome by a strange emotion and his heart starts beating faster… Unbeknownst to the four, this is the beginning of their magnificent love story; one that would last years to come.  
  
PTBR: Hoshino Sayaka é uma menina muito tímida e que tem um grande talento para atuação. No seu primeiro dia de aula, Suzuki Hikaru vê Sayaka atuando no terraço da escola, e ele se apaixona imediatamente por ela. Mas no meio disso temos também Chihiro, que é melhor amiga de Hikaru que nutre uma paixão secreta por ele, e também Suzuki Shinobu que é rival de Hikaru e que se apaixonou por Chihiro!! O que acontecerá com esses 4 amigos?!

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

title.en: The Color of the End: Mission in the Apocalypse

description.en:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans.
Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land.
Will humans be found?
A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.
___
[Alt Official Raw (KADOComi)](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)
description.fr: Dans une métropole post-apocalyptique déserte criblée d'une matière mystérieuse, une jeune fille recherche tout signe de vie et des provisions.
description.tr: İnsanlığın yok olduğu bir dünyada dolaşan yalnız bir kız hakkında kıyamet sonrası bilimkurgu macerası.

description.en: The prince-like girl, Asahi, and supposedly normal (but of course handsome and earnest) guy Kuro are in the same club.   They agree to pretend to date as a 'Boyfriend/Girlfriend Tutorial'.   You know where this is going, it's complete romcom fluff- and if you like that you'll like this.
description.ja: 【アフタヌーン四季賞2023夏 佳作】イケメン女子・旭は、同級生の黒に「デートに憧れている」と悩みを打ち明け──。
description.vi:
The prince-like girl, Asahi, and supposedly normal (but of course handsome and earnest) guy Kuro are in the same club.   They agree to pretend to date as a 'Boyfriend/Girlfriend Tutorial'.   You know where this is going, it's complete romcom fluff- and if you like that you'll like this.

Asahi - một cô nàng đẹp trai, và Kuro - một chàng trai ưa nhìn và bình thường ở cùng chung một câu lạc bộ. Một ngày, ho quyết định giả bộ làm "người yêu" để luyện tập.
description.pt-br: A garota que parece um príncipe, Asahi, e o supostamente normal (mas é claro, bonito e sincero) Kuro estão no mesmo clube. Eles concordam em fingir namorar como um ‘Tutorial de Namorado/Namorada’. Você sabe para onde isso está indo, é um completo clichê de comédia romântica - e se você gosta disso, vai gostar deste mangá.

description.en: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
description.es: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?
description.ja: この世界に、私は”必要”かーー！？何気ない日常の中、刀を背に空を翔ぶ「ムジナ」と呼ばれる者の実体とは…？人間とは、社会とは、人権とは、そして幸せとは…
description.ru: История о юной девушке-убийце с катаной, которая охотится за своими целями в оживлённом столичном городе Цукумо.
description.es-la: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?

description.en: An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable, everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties, focusing on the fears lurking within daily life, which continue to escalate.

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

altTitles.th: ท่านพ่อไร้เทียมทาน

description.en:
Noh Ga Jang has led the life of a warrior ever since he remembers, isolated from the world and illiterate to top it all, until he meets a beautiful woman who steals his heart. He marries her and they live a life of bliss, and she gets pregnant with his children. Against all odds, she unexpectedly dies during childbirth, leaving Noh alone with their newborn triplets. Desperate, saddened, but not broken, Noh swears to the heavens that he'll become an exemplary man to raise the invaluable treasures his wife left him.  
  
Watch the mighty warrior Noh become a Peerless Dad, and slowly realize in the way just how powerful he is for the sake of his children.

description.ko:
하늘의 뜻을 아니, 그 누가 아비父에 견주리오! 
고아로 떠돌다 운 좋게 스승을 만나 특급 해결사로 이름을 날리던 노가장.
사랑하는 여인을 만나 이름대로 가장家長이 된다는 기쁨도 잠시, 하루아침에 핏덩이 세쌍둥이를 홀로 키워야 하는 신세가 되었다. 아비는 그 어떤 경우라도 제 새끼의 입에 먹을 걸 넣어 줘야 하는 존재인 법! 노가장은 위험천만한 낭인 생활을 때려치우고 천룡회 갑급 무사가 되어  자식새끼들 잘 먹이고 입히고자 한다. 하지만 억지로 나간 출장 임무는 목숨이 위험하기만 하고 그 사이 사방에선 그의 아이들을 눈독 들이기 시작하는데…… 기다려라, 내 새끼들아! 여기 아비가 간다! 
아버지, 노가장의 좌충우돌 무협 액션&육아 일지!

* 원작소설 <지천명아비무쌍>

description.pt:
Noh Ga Jang teve a vida de um guerreiro desde que ele tem memória, isolado do mundo e analfabeto, até conhecer uma mulher bonita que rouba seu coração. Ele se casa com ela e vive uma vida de folia, e ela fica grávida dos seus filhos. Inesperadamente, ela morre durante o parto, deixando o Noh apenas com seus trigêmeos recém-nascidos. Desesperado, triste, mas não quebrado, Noh proclama aos céus que ele se tornará um homem exemplar para criar os tesouros inestimáveis que sua esposa o deixou.  
  
Vamos testemunhar o guerreiro implacável Noh se tornando um pai incomparável, percebendo o quão poderoso ele pode ser pelo bem dos seus filhos.

История бесподобного отца, которому известна воля небес. Автор Но Гён Чхан широко известен по манхве Красная Буря, но если вам нужна другая причина для чтения, то это удивительная история приключений мастера боевых искусств, включающая свадьбу, заботы отца и битвы. Она во многом похожа на Красную Бурю: крутой мастер, главный герой, беспокоящийся о своей семье, трагическая предыстория. Обязательно к прочтению для каждого, кому понравилась Красная Буря.

description.en:
Kuroda Kanbei Yoshitaka and Takenaka "Hanbei" Shigeharu are the two genius military advisors who led Toyotomi Hideyoshi to unify the nation. 

A dull and unmarried salaryman in his thirties wake up one day to find that he had become Hanbei! He had been reborn along with seven other men of the same age and circumstance! 

That night, he suddenly found himself in an empty room with a PC with a chatroom called "Tea Room' open. Apparently, he could use this to chat with his fellow reincarnators? 

Will they be able to survive in this era of battle and strife?

description.en:
Since ancient times, rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this, the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night, hunting down these bloodthirsty demons.  
Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy, they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko, turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow, a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off, but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills, Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained.  
So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter, bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family.  
  
MangaPlus: <https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009>
description.ru: Танджиро - старший сын в семье, потерявшей кормильца. А всё из-за слухов о демоне, который разгуливает в горах под покровом темноты. Утром парень вернётся домой живым и невредимым… Но его ждут ужасные известия.

description.de: Himuro ist Büroangestellter und der Nachfahre einer Schneefrau. Wann immer seine Gefühle außer Kontrolle geraten, werden seine Kollegen seinen eisigen Kräften ausgesetzt. Jedoch besitzt er entgegen seiner frostigen Fähigkeiten eine sehr warmherzige und freundliche Persönlichkeit. Er liebt Katzen und Blumen, auch wenn er ihnen nicht zu nahe kommen kann. Diejenige, die seine Gefühle immer wieder aus der Bahn wirft und sein Herz zum Schmelzen bringt, ist seine stets gefasst wirkende und ein wenig exzentrische Kollegin Fuyutsuki. Obwohl alle Kollegen durch den stetigen Ausbruch seiner Kräfte von seinen Gefühlen für Fuyutsuki wissen, ist diese vollkommen ahnungslos. Dies hält Himuro jedoch nicht davon ab, zu versuchen, ihr Herz für sich zu gewinnen.
description.en:
A cute fluffy romance about the decendant of a yuki-onna who freezes the surrounding area every time he talks to his cute coworker.

x.5 chapters are longer than normal chapters and have more fluffy content, make sure to read them!

---
Himuro is a living descendant of the Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. But anytime he's around his eccentric yet kind colleague, Fuyutsuki-san, he totally freezes up! Despite the snowstorm of love that rages on in his heart, and her complete cluelessness, will he take a step forward or stay frozen in place?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Penguin Random House](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/series/FQP/the-ice-guy-and-the-cool-girl/)
description.fr:
Himuro est le descendant d'une yuki-onna, une femme des neiges. Par cette filiation, il plonge inconsciemment son entourage dans un environnement proche de l'Arctique lorsqu'il se concentre.

Pire encore, il passe pour un homme qu'il n'est pas : perçu comme insensible et au tempérament glacial, il est en réalité chaleureux, aime les chats et les fleurs.

Son état finit par attirer l'attention de sa collégue Fuyutsuki, dont il est secrètement amoureux. Himuro se montre alors déterminé à capturer le coeur de la jeune femme.
description.id: Romansa lembut yang lucu tentang dekendensi yuki-onna yang membekukan area sekitarnya setiap kali dia berbicara dengan rekan kerjanya yang imut.
description.it:
Il manga racconta la dolce storia d'amore tra due colleghi, la tranquilla e dolce Fuyutsuki-san e Himuro-kun, discendente di una donna delle nevi, che letteralmente ghiaccia ogni cosa attorno a lui.

---
Questa è la storia di Himuro, il discendente di una donna delle nevi, e della sua gentile seppur particolare collega Fuyutsuki... Anche se a prima vista possono sembrare due persone imperturbabili, entrambi sono in realtà molto impacciati quando si tratta di questioni di cuore; infatti l’amore che Himuro nutre nei confronti di Fuyutsuki imperversa nel suo animo come una bufera di neve, impedendogli di compiere il fatidico primo passo. Lei, d’altro canto, pare del tutto inconsapevole dei suoi stessi sentimenti...
description.ja: 現代を生きる雪女の末裔な氷室くんと、同僚のちょっとユニークで優しい冬月さん。一見、クールに見えつつも、二人は恋愛にすっごく不器用。冬月さんへの「好き」が心の内で吹雪のように吹き荒れる氷室くんはもう一歩を踏み出せず、一方の冬月さんは自分の感情に超が付くほど鈍感で!?　Twitter＆pixivで大人気!!　クールな二人のピュア過ぎラブコメディー♪　単行本だけの描き下ろしマンガ３編を収録☆
description.ko:
현대를 살아가는 설녀의 후예 히무로와 
약간 독특하면서도 상냥한 동료 후유츠키. 

언뜻 보면 쿨해보이는 두 사람이지만, 연애에 관해서는 놀랄 만큼 서투르다. 
후유츠키를 향한 ‘호감’이 마음속에서 눈보라처럼 몰아치자, 
히무로는 더 이상 한 걸음도 나아가지 못하고. 
후유츠키 역시도 자신의 감정에 둔감하기는 마찬가지였는데!? 

Twitter&pixiv에서 대인기!! 
쿨한 두 사람의 맑다 못해 투명한 러브 코미디♪ 

단행본만의 오리지널 에피소드 3편도 수록☆
description.pl: Poznajcie Himuro, żyjącego we współczesnej Japonii potomka yuki-onny, oraz jego nieco nietypową koleżankę z biurka obok, Fuyutsuki. Choć na pierwszy rzut oka oboje wydają się spokojni i opanowani, tak naprawdę w miłości nie do końca dobrze sobie radzą. Himuro, w którego sercu panuje miłosna zamieć, nie jest w stanie wykonać kolejnego kroku naprzód, zaś Fuyutsuki zdaje się nie zauważać jego starań…
description.ru: Милый пушистый роман о классной работнице и её, холодном как лёд, коллеге.
description.th:
ฮิมุโระคุง ชายหนุ่มผู้สืบเชื้อสายของสาวหิมะซึ่งใช้ชีวิตอยู่ในยุคปัจจุบัน 
และคุณฟุยุสึกิ เพื่อนร่วมงานสาวผู้อ่อนโยนและค่อนข้างไม่เหมือนใคร 
หากมองแค่ผิวเผิน หนุ่มสาวคู่นี้ก็ดูเป็นคนคูลๆ อยู่หรอก 
แต่พอเป็นเรื่องราวความรักแล้ว ทั้งสองกลับไม่เอาไหนซะเลย
ฮิมุโระคุงผู้ได้แต่เก็บความ "ชอบ" 
ที่มีต่อฟุยุสึกิไว้ในใจประหนึ่งพายุหิมะที่โหมกระหน่ำ 
โดยไม่กล้าก้าวออกไปเริ่มต้นสักที 
ส่วนฝ่ายคุณฟุยุสึกิเองก็ช่างความรู้สึกช้าไม่รู้ใจตัวเองเลย!?
description.tr: Sevimli iş arkadaşıyla her konuştuğunda çevreyi donduran ve Yuki-Onna'nın soyundan gelen adam hakkında sevimli, kabarık bir romantizm.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy. Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy.
description.zh: 冰属性男子与酷酷女同事漫画 ，当雪男遇上酷酷女同事，办公室将掀起一场恋爱暴风雪！
description.pt-br: Himuro-kun, descendente de uma Yuki-onna moderna, acabou de chegar em seu novo trabalho, e acaba criando tempestades de neve e bonecos de neve quando é tomado por suas emoções e perde o controle. Sua paixão secreta por Fuyutsuki-san, uma colega de trabalho única, mas gentil, cresce tão forte que congela às vezes aqueles ao seu redor. Por outro lado, Fuyutsuki-san, que muitas vezes é visto como legal pelos outros, também está muito interessada no misterioso Himuro-kun. O relacionamento deles muda gradualmente através do trabalho diário e dos eventos da empresa, e eles também começam a passar tempo juntos, mas ambos são desajeitados no amor e não conseguem se aproximar…

title.en: The Descent of the Demonic Master

description.en:
The first life: After a tragic accident losing his family and legs, he ends his own life.

The second life: He earned fame as the Red Demonic Master in Zhongyuan, but was betrayed by the man he trusted the most.

And now comes his third life. In his life back in the modern world, Gang Jinho decides to live a normal life. However, he was too used to the Zhongyuan life to become a normal person!

"I wanted to live peacefully. But you are the ones who started it. I hope you're prepared for this."

In front of the threats of his new life, can Gang Jinho shake off his impulses as the Red Demonic Master and obtain the 'normal life' he desires? The adaptation story of a legendary martial artist in the 21st century!
description.pl: Jego pierwsze życie zakończyło się szybko i tragicznie. W drugim został Demonicznym Mistrzem, lecz przez to narobił sobie wrogów i został zabity w młodym wieku. Po drugiej śmierci powrócił do swojego pierwotnego świata, do czasu przed wypadkiem i przed jego tragicznym życiem kaleki. Postanowił, że teraz zrobi co w jego mocy, by żyć spokojnie i szczęśliwie.
description.ru: Первая жизнь. После трагического несчастного случая, потеряв свою семью и ноги, он заканчивает свою собственную жизнь. Вторая жизнь. Он заслужил славу Красного демонического мастера в Чжунъюане, но был предан человеком, которому доверял больше всего. И вот наступает его третья жизнь. В своей жизни, вернувшись в современный мир, Ган Цзиньхо решает жить нормальной жизнью… Однако он слишком привык к жизни Чжунъюаня, чтобы стать нормальным человеком! -Я хотел жить спокойно. Но ведь это вы все начали. Надеюсь, вы к этому готовы."Перед лицом угроз его новой жизни, может Ли Ган Джинхо стряхнуть свои импульсы как красный демонический Мастер и получить "нормальную жизнь", которую он желает?
description.tr:
İlk hayatında, trajik bir kazanın ardından hem ayaklarını hemde ailesini kaybedince kendi hayatını sonlandırdı. İkinci hayatında, Zhongyuan‘da Kızıl Şeytani Egemen olarak şan ve şöhret kazandı. Lakin en güvendiği kişi tarafından ihanete uğradı. Ardından üçüncü hayatında ise modern dünyadaki yaşamına geri döndü ve Gang Jinho normal bir hayat yaşamaya karar verdi…. ama normal bir şekilde yaşayabilmek için Zhongyuan‘daki hayatına çok alışmıştı! “huzurlu bir şekilde yaşamak istemiştim, bunu siz başlattınız. umarım kendinizi hazırlamışsınızdır.” yeni hayatının tehditleri karşısında Gang Jinho, Kızıl Şeytani Egemenin dürtülerini yakasından atıp dilediği gibi “normal bir hayat” sürebilecek mi?  
  
[Official French on Delitoon](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/return-of-the-demonic-master)
description.pt-br: Primeira vida. Depois de um trágico acidente perdendo sua família e suas pernas, ele comete suicídio. Segunda vida. Ganhou fama como o Mestre Demoníaco Vermelho em Zhongyuan, mas foi traído pelo homem em quem mais confiava. E agora vem sua terceira vida. Uma nova vida no mundo moderno, Gang Jinho decide vivê-la normalmente… No entanto, ele estava muito acostumado com a vida em Zhongyuan para se tornar uma pessoa normal! Eu queria viver em paz. Mas você quem começou. Espero que você esteja preparado diante das ameaças de sua nova vida, Gang Jinho pode se livrar de seus impulsos como o Mestre Demoníaco Vermelho e conseguir a 'vida normal' que ele tanto deseja? Essa é a adaptação da história de um lendário artista marcial no século XXI! <A Descendência do Mestre Demoníaco>

description.en: A "police box" drama that peeks into the daily life of police officers...

Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven “chosen heroes” meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly “useless” skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he’s never seen before!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された少年ソラは、勇者として魔王と戦うことを命じられる。しかし与えられた「ウォーキング」スキルの効果は、どんなに歩いても疲れないだけ! 国王から見放され、追放されたソラであったが、一度異世界へ足を踏み出すと突然レベルアップ!? 実は「ウォーキング」には「1歩進むごとに経験値１を獲得する」という隠し効果があったのだ!! その経験値で様々なスキルを獲得、歩くごとに万能となっていくソラは、のんびり気ままな異世界の旅へと歩み出す!!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

title.en: I Ran Away and Got Married

description.en:
“You’re mine.”

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuri’s archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

“I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.”

“The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.”

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

“Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.”

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

“I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

“You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”

Despite his harsh words, Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%84%EB%A7%9D%EC%B3%A4%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%84-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%90%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3299), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61190666)

altTitles.en: I Think It Would Be Better For Me to Become King

description.en:
Astarote is a young woman who is transported into a romance game that she loved. She takes on the role of the villain, who is married to Prince Cedric, her favorite character. However, she discovers that the end of the game is tragic for her, as she is accused of being an impostor and is executed by the king.

She tries to change her husband's destiny, making him become the new king, but in every route she ends up dying. Desperate, she decides to take radical action: she will become the queen and change the course of history. But to do so, she will have to face many obstacles, intrigues, enemies and secrets.
description.fr:
Je me suis finalement procurée le jeu que je désirais depuis longtemps. Alors que je profitais de ma vie avec Cédric, mon seul choix, au moment où j'ai appuyé sur la dernière option, [la reine Astarote, qui a osé prétendre être du sang royale du précédent roi, a été condamnée à mort !].
"Quel gâchis, si j'avais été à sa place, j'aurais fait mieux que ça !"
Et dès que j'ai dit ça, je suis entrée dans le jeu immédiatement.
"Au revoir, Astarote."
"Je veux juste que tu meures, Astarote."
J'ai essayé de nombreuses façons de faire de mon mari le roi, mais à la fin, j'ai toujours été confrontée à la mort. Je n'en peux plus.
"Si je continue ainsi, je serai toujours tuée, il ne me reste plus qu'une seule solution !"
"Je pense que ça serait mieux que je devienne ROI."
[Une nouvelle voie a été ouverte.]

description.en: They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.

description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

description.en:
Many people suddenly find themselves in a white, empty space, where a God-like figure tells them that they are to be reincarnated and sent to an isekai known as Tesla. They are given a limited number of points to spend in various attributes, such as their race and abilities, which will determine their reincarnation into Tesla.

The story follows a young boy sent there along with his clanmates from an MMORPG, and they plan to stick together and specialize into different skills, just like they did in-game. Although his clanmates and everyone else sent there are strangely accepting of the situation, he finds it too suspicious and decides to go his own separate way, balancing his points out to be an all-rounder instead of a healer.

He leisurely goes about life in Tesla as an adventurer, but it slowly starts to seem like there was a reason behind them being sent there…  

---  
  
- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054885201112) (Raw)

description.ar: بلانش ، البطلة ، خجولة ولطيفة. لكنها محتقرة من قبل عائلتها. لا تستطيع التغلب على ازدراء عائلتها وتحاول الانتحار. عندما فتحت عيني ، كنت في عالم اللعبة الذي صنعته! إذا كنت أرغب في البقاء على قيد الحياة في هذا العالم ، فأنا بحاجة إلى إحضار ريكاردو ، الشرير إلى جانبي. لكن ريكاردو يجري غريب ؟!
description.en:
To Blanche, everything seemed hopeless. Until she realized it was all a game. One she made, to be exact. Now she has a goal: Become the villain's right-hand man! But wait. Why is she the one saving him...?

Blanche, who is timid and kind but is despised by her family, cannot overcome her family's contempt and attempts suicide.

After that, when I opened my eyes, this world was the game world I made!!

To survive in this world, I must have the villain Ricardo to my side. But Ricardo's condition is strange?!

---
To Blanche, everything seemed hopeless. Until she realized it was all a game. One she made, to be exact. Now she has a goal: Become the villain's right-hand man! But wait. Why is she the one saving him...?
description.es: Blanche, la protagonista femenina, es tímida y agradable. Pero ella es despreciada por su familia. No puede superar el desdén de su familia e intenta suicidarse. Cuando abrí los ojos, ¡estaba en el mundo del juego que creé! Si quiero sobrevivir en este mundo, necesito traer a Ricardo, el villano, a mi lado. ¿Pero Ricardo está siendo raro?
description.fr: Née dans une famille qui la martyrise, tout semble perdu d'avance pour Blanche. Mais tout est bien plus simple quand on a créé soi-même le jeu-vidéo dans le quel on vit… Maintenant, elle n'a plus qu'une chose en tête: se joindre au grand méchant de l'histoire pour échapper à son destin. Que la vengeance est douce…
description.id: Blanche, seorang putri kerajaan yang "berbeda" terjebak dalam keluarga yang menggunakannya demi nama baik dan kepentingan mereka. Ingin membalikkan keadaan, apa yang akan Blanche lakukan?
description.ja:
前世の記憶とともによみがえったブランシュ。
家族の元を離れ、悪党リカルドの右腕になろうと無法都市ジギタリスを目指すも、いざ会ったリカルドの様子がおかしい。 
「ブランシュ…頼むから俺を嫌わないでくれ。君に嫌われたらと思うと息もまともにできなくなるんだ。」彼女の耳元でそうささやくとリカルドはぎゅっと抱きしめ涙を流した。
これは世界屈指の悪党たちから崇められる話。そして彼女の寵愛を得ようと一人の男が奮闘する話。
それから…ブランシュが本当の「家族」を選ぶ物語。
description.ko:
소심하고 착하지만 가족에게 멸시를 당하는
블랑쉐(여주)는 가족들의 멸시를 이겨내지 못하고
자살시도를 하고 만다.

그 이후 눈을 뜨니 이 세계는 내가 만들었던 게임세계!!

이 세계에서 살아남을려면
악역인 리카르도(남주)를 내편으로 만들어야해.
그런데 리카르도의 상태가 이상하다?!
description.pt:
Blanche, a irmã mais nova de um dos pretendentes da protagonista feminina, é tímida e simpática. Mas ela é desprezada por seus familiares. Ela não consegue superar o desdém de sua família e tenta cometer suicídio. “Quando abri os olhos, eu estava no mundo do jogo que criei! Se eu quiser sobreviver neste mundo, preciso trazer Ricardo, o vilão, para o meu lado. Mas por que Ricardo está agindo tão estranho assim?!”

---
Blanche, que é tímida e gentil, mas é desprezada por sua família, não consegue superar o desprezo de sua família e tenta o suicídio. Depois disso, quando abri meus olhos, este mundo era o mundo do jogo que eu fiz!! ter o vilão Ricardo ao meu lado. Mas a condição de Ricardo é estranha?!
description.ru: Бланш - милая и робкая девушка. К сожалению, родственники презирают её. У главной героини не получается справиться с пренебрежительным отношением семьи, поэтому бедняжка решается наложить на себя руки... "Открыв глаза, я поняла, что оказалась в собственном игровом мире! Но если мне хочется выжить в нём, то нужно привлечь на свою сторону злодея Рикардо... Постойте, мне кажется, или он ведёт себя как-то странно?!"
description.th: บล็องช์ สาวน้อยสุดอาภัพฟื้นขึ้นมาพร้อมความทรงจำในชาติก่อนเธอจึงหาทางหนีไปจากครอบครัวตัวแสบของตัวเองและมุ่งหน้าไปยังดิจิทาลิส เมืองอันไร้กฎหมายเพื่อเป็นมือขวาของตัวร้ายอย่างริคาร์โด แต่เมื่อพบกันเขากลับทำตัวแปลกประหลาด ริคาร์โดดึงบล็องช์เข้าไปกอดพร้อมน้ำตาไหลแล้วกระซิบข้างหูว่า "อย่าเกลียดข้าเลย ไม่งั้นข้าคงมีชีวิตอยู่ต่อไปไม่ได้แน่" เรื่องราวของสาวน้อยที่ได้รับการยกย่องจากเหล่าตัวร้ายและชายที่ทำทุกอย่างเพื่อให้ได้ความรักของเธอมา
description.uk:
Бланш сором'язлива і добра, але її зневажає сім'я. Не маючи сил поболати презирливе ставлення сім'ї вона чинить спробу самогубства...
Опісля, відкривши очі я зрозуміла, що знаходжусь у світі гри яку створила!! Що б вижити в цьому світі я маю переманити на свій бік злодія Рікардо. Але Рікардо поводиться якось дивно?!

Примітка:Це опис до манхви в ориганалі та перекладах, хоча він не точно передає цю історію. Манхва написана за новелою.
description.vi: Blanche là một nữ chính nhút nhát, thiện lương nhưng cô lại bị chính gia đình của mình khinh thường. Cô không thể chịu đựng thêm việc mình bị lăng nhục và buộc phải tìm đến cái chết. Nhưng khi tỉnh lại, đập vào mắt cô là một bối cảnh quen thuộc- chính là thế giới trong game mà cô đã tạo ra! Cô hiểu rõ rằng nếu muốn tồn tại trong không gian này, Ricardo- kẻ phản diện phải đứng về phía mình. Nhưng mà, đã có gì đó sai sai…
description.zh: 家族耻辱布兰雪，逃婚跳楼觉醒前世记忆，这竟是她所设计的养成恋爱游戏？！只有成为恶女才能舒服地活下去，她利用游戏系统疯狂升级，不仅得到了所有反派的崇拜，连最终BOSS男主都靠她养成？
description.zh-hk:
雖然一直小心善良，但卻被家人蔑視的布蘭雪，某天無法再忍受家人的蔑視，於是試圖自殺。

但睜開眼後，這竟然是我所設計出來的遊戲世界！

如果想要在這個世界上活下去，就必須得讓反派列卡度站在我這邊。

可是列卡度的狀態很奇怪？ ！

---
帶著前世記憶甦醒的布蘭雪，離開了不愛自己的家，一路來到無法治都市狄吉塔利斯。企圖在此成為反派裡卡爾多的左右手以求安身的她，實際遇到裡卡爾多時，卻覺得他有點怪怪的？裡卡爾多哭哭啼啼深怕被她丟下，一副楚楚可憐的模樣……
這是一部描述布蘭雪被世界級黑幫兄弟擁戴崇拜的故事。也是一個男人為了得到她的寵愛而奮鬥的故事。
同時還是…布蘭雪要選擇真正的「家人」的故事。

altTitles.fr: Je suis devenu le voyou de la famille du comte

altTitles.th: อันธพาลแห่งตระกูลเคานต์
คุณชายไม่เอาไหนแห่งตระกูลเคานต์

altTitles.ja: 伯爵家の暴れん坊になった

altTitles.pt-br: O Lixo da Família do Conde

altTitles.fr: Je suis devenu la honte de la Maison du Comte

description.en:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?
description.fr: Réincarné dans un roman, c’est le rêve non? Pas tout à fait, surtout quand on est devenu une ordure qui se fait tabasser par le héros au début de l’histoire… Vu qu’il sait ce qui va se passer, pas question de se faire taper dessus! Et puis, si au passage il peut en profiter pour se la couler douce…
description.id:
Saat membuka mata, aku sudah berada di dalam dunia novel.
Tidak hanya itu, aku masuk ke dalam tubuh seorang tuan muda dari keluarga Count yang terkenal sebagai pembuat onar.
Tetapi, aku tidak bisa menjadi seorang pembuat onar begitu saja kan?
description.it: Quando Kim aprì gli occhi non poteva credere a ciò che stava vedendo. Si era ritrovato inspiegabilmente all’interno di un libro che stava leggendo. Ora lui è Cale Henituse, un antagonista del racconto. Il problema più grande però, è che lui non aveva finito di leggere il libro. Quindi ora lui vive il suo personaggio e gli eventi della storia per come se li ricorda. Ma cosa dovrà fare Cale Henituse una volta superato il punto dove Kim si era fermato?
description.ja:
目を開けると、そこは小説の中だった。 暴君として名高い伯爵家の令息の体に憑依してしまい…!?

description.ko:
눈을 떠보니 소설 속이었다.
그컷도 망나니로 유명한 백작가의 도련님 몸으로.......
그리고, 소설 속에서 나를 박살 냈던 
막강한 주인공 최한이 곧 여기로 온다.
description.pl:
Gdy otworzyłem oczy, znalazłem się w świecie z powieści „Narodziny bohatera”.

Książka ta opisuje przygody Choi Hana - licealisty, który przeniósł się z Ziemi do innego świata - oraz wielu innych bohaterów. Ja znalazłem się w ciele śmiecia z hrabskiej rodziny, na której to terytorium położona jest wioska, w której mieszka Choi Han.

Po tym, jak wioska zostaje zaatakowana przez tajemniczych napastników, główny bohater powiadamia o zdarzeniu syna hrabiego, lecz ten go zbywa.
Następnie ów syn zostaje zbity na kwaśne jabłko.

„To… dość problematyczne.”
description.ru:
Я очнулся в романе, в теле молодого наследника графства, прославленного не без помощи его жестокого выродка.  
Но я не собираюсь быть таким же ублюдком.
description.th:
เมื่อ 'คิมรกซู' ต้องไปอยู่ในร่างอันธพาลตัวร้ายในเรื่องอย่าง 'เคล'
เขาจึงตั้งปณิธานกับตัวเองว่าจะต้องมีชีวิตรอด ไม่ถูก 'ชเวฮัน' ตัวเอกของเรื่อง อัดจนเละเหมือนในนิยาย
และเคลยังตัองร่วมเดินทางผจญภัยไปกับตัวละครในเรื่อง 'กำเนิดวีรชน'
เขาจะมีชีวิตรอด ไม่เจ็บป่วย และใช้ชีวิตได้สงบสุขอย่างที่ต้องการหรือไม่

description.uk:
Коли я відкрив очі, я опинився в новелі.

[Народження героя] - новела, присвячений пригодам головного героя Чхве Хана, хлопчика старшої школи, якого перенесли в інший вимір із Землі, і який народжений як один з численних героїв континенту .
Я став частиною цього роману як старший син графа, сім'я, якого контролювала територію, де знаходиться перше село, яке відвідує Чхве Хань.

Чхве Хан змінюєть після того села, а після — всі її мешканці буди вбиті таємною організацією.

Більшою проблемою є той факт, що цей нікчемний покидьок, яким я став, не знає про те, що трапилося в селі, і насміхається над Чхве Ханом, лише щоб його побили.

"... Це стане проблемою"

Я відчуваю, що зі мною станеться щось серйозне.

Але варто спробувати зробити своє нове життя кращим.
description.zh: 一个出场5秒就下线的贵族混混，一个高冷霸气的英雄男主，穿成前者还马上要被高冷男主暴揍怎么办？呵，作为一个美貌废物，当然只能靠骚操作，抱大腿抢机遇努力在这个充斥着魔法，龙，狼族的大陆求生存！
description.pt-br: “Não posso continuar sendo um lixo pra sempre.” Após ler os 5 primeiros volumes da novel [O Nascimento de um Herói], Kim Rok-Soo dorme e acorda em outro mundo. Ele havia sido transportado para o mundo da novel no corpo de Cale Henituse, o lixo da família do conde Henituse e um nobre mimado que tinha sido espancado pelo protagonista no começo da história. Neste novo mundo cheio de perigo e magia, Cale Henituse (Kim Rok-Soo) deseja apenas viver uma vida tranquila e livre de problemas, mas as coisas nem sempre vão de acordo com o planejado…
description.zh-hk:
睜開眼就發現自己到了小說世界，
而且我還變成了赫赫有名的伯爵家混混少爺...
另外，小說裡那個
把我當成沙包揍的強大主角——崔漢，
很快就要抵達這裡了。

description.en:
Monsters have suddenly appeared! However, a hero has shown up to save the city and its people from being destroyed!

But he isn't just a hero...?

A new superhuman hero action series begins!

altTitles.ja: デビィ・ザ・コルシファは負けず嫌い

altTitles.en: Debby the little lucifer is emulous

description.en:
*"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"*   
  
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!
description.ja: 「暇つぶしに人間でも滅ぼすかのう！」突如として現れた、史上最強の悪魔！でもコイツ...チョロすぎ!?ポンコツだけど負けず嫌いな悪魔と繰り広げる暇つぶしコメディー、開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды в комнату Рокуро неожиданно заявился сильнейший в мире демон! Но постойте, что же это... Неужто она настолько пустоголовая!? Встречайте великолепную комедийную историю о неуклюжем демоне, пытающимся скоротать время за людскими играми!

title.en: I Can Change the Timeline of Everything

altTitles.zh: 我可以修改万物时间线

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Keyi Xiugai Wanwu Shijian Xian
Wǒ Kěyǐ Xiūgǎi Wànwù Shíjiān Xiàn

description.en: “What should I do if the elixir has expired? Don’t be afraid! Just reverse the elixir’s time, I want all of your expired elixirs! What should I do if the cultivation method is too slow? Don’t be afraid! Just adjust the cultivation time forwards by hundreds of years, the cultivation method will be successfully mastered immediately. What if the growth of Spiritual Grass is too slow? Don’t be afraid! Just accelerate the growth time of the Spiritual Grass by tens of thousands of years, and the Spiritual Grass immediately becomes a Divine plant. Traveling to another world and discovering that you are a waste material? Don’t be afraid! I can change the timeline of everything!”
description.zh: 丹药过期怎么办？不怕！我能回溯丹药时间，你们过期的丹药我全都要！ 修炼功法太慢怎么办？不怕我能将修炼功法的时间往后调上五年，功法立即是大成。 身体受伤了怎么办？不怕！我能回溯身子的状态，让你的身子恢复受伤之前的样子。 穿越到异世界发现自己是个废材？ 不怕！ 我可以修改万物时间线！

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
description.ru: Когда я вернулся домой в первый раз спустя долгое время, мой младший брат стал девушкой!?

description.en: Arsène Lupin III is the grandson of the master thief Arsène Lupin. With his cohorts Daisuke Jigen and Goemon Ishikawa XIII and his love interest Fujiko Mine, he pulls off the greatest heists of all time while always escaping the grasp of Inspector Zenigata.
description.pt-br: Um homem misterioso e um mestre ladino extraordinário, Lupin III vem de uma longa linhagem de bandidos de elite, todos comprometidos em roubar dos ricos e dar a si mesmos. Felizmente, Lupin tende a evitar roubar os virtuosos da sociedade e, em vez disso, tem como alvo alguns personagens bastante obscuros. Claro, ele é parceiro de algumas figuras bastante duvidosas também: Daisuke Jigen é um ex-assassino da máfia com uma postura sombria, sua marca registrada é o fedora preto inclinado escondendo os olhos. Goemon Ishikawa é um espadachim enigmático com conotações de samurai que misteriosamente entra e sai das façanhas de Lupin. Fujiko Mine é o objeto do afeto de Lupin, mas, como ela também é uma ladra, o romance da dupla eventualmente se choca com a competição por grandes alvos. A força policial global, Interpol, e em particular o tenaz Inspetor Zenigata, desejam capturar Lupin e sua gangue. A relação de Zenigata com o mestre ladrão é complicada, caracterizada pelo respeito mútuo misturado com total desdém.

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: Tsubasa-chan, Kimi wa.  Macchingu shita Onna wa Satsujinki

altTitles.ru: Цубаса-тян: девушка, с которой у тебя взаимность, — серийная убийца

altTitles.ja: ツバサちゃん、君は　マッチングした女は殺人鬼

altTitles.pt-br: Tsubasa-chan, você é… Meu Match Assasino 🖤

description.en:
A dull university student, Sousuke-kun’s only comfort lies in messaging Tsubasa-chan, a girl he met on a dating app. A cute and kind girl, talking to her only leads to good things for Sousuke. But who is Tsubasa-chan, really?   
During their messaging, by chance when sending a casual message, Sousuke opened the curtains to the play of his own hell.   
The fated girl, “Tsubasa-chan”, has set out to destroy his everything. So begins the unpredictable suspense story!  


---
description.ru: Единственным утешением в жизни угрюмого студента Соскэ была переписка с «Цубасой-тян», которую он повстречал в приложении для знакомств. Милой, да ещё и доброй. Поговоришь с ней — и сразу всё хорошо. Но кто же она такая? А между тем Соскэ отправляет ей беспечное сообщение, не подозревая, что оно погрузит его жизнь в ад. И теперь девушка, которую он считал своей судьбой, разрушит всё, что ему дорого. Непредсказуемый триллер!
description.pt-br:
Um estudante universitário entediado, Sousuke-kun, encontra conforto apenas em mensagens com Tsubasa-chan, uma garota que ele conheceu em um aplicativo de namoro. Uma garota fofa e gentil, conversar com ela só leva a coisas boas para Sousuke. Mas quem é Tsubasa-chan, realmente?
Durante suas mensagens, por acaso ao enviar uma mensagem casual, Sousuke abriu as cortinas para a peça do seu próprio inferno.
A garota do destino, "Tsubasa-chan", se propôs a destruir tudo o que ele tem. Começa então a história de suspense imprevisível!

title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.

Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh-hk:
於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

title.en: Taida na Akujoku Kizoku ni Tensei shita Ore, Scenario o Bukkowashitara Kikakugai no Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta

altTitles.ja: 怠惰な悪辱貴族に転生した俺、シナリオをぶっ壊したら規格外の魔力で最凶になった

altTitles.ja-ro: Taida na Akujoku Kizoku ni Tensei shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowashitara Kikakugai no Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta
Taidana Akuhazukashime Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowashitara Kikaku Gai No Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as the Lazy and Villainous Noble, I Broke the Scenario and Became the Most Formidable With Extraordinary Magic

altTitles.vi: chuyển sinh thành quý tộc phản diện và lười biếng, tôi trở thành kẻ mạnh nhất học viện

altTitles.uk: Я перевтілився у Дворянина-Лиходія, проте змінив сценарій і став найбільш грізним магом

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the villainous noble Weiss from my favorite academy game, and the fate that awaits me is nothing but the worst possible ruin, with no salvation.

I absolutely have to avoid that at all costs!

Then the only way out is to gain overwhelming power that even surpasses the game's protagonist and become the strongest!
description.ja:
大好きな学園ゲームに登場する悪役貴族・ヴァイスに転生してしまった、やがてこの身に待ち受けるのは、救いなしの最悪な破滅エンド。

それだけはなんとしてでも回避したい！

だったらこのゲームの主人公すら遠く及ばない、圧倒的な力を身につけて最強になるしかない！

最凶成り上がり異世界学園ファンタジーコミカライズ!
description.vi: Tôi đã tái sinh vào vai một quý tộc phản diện tên Weiss trong game học viện mà tôi thích nhất, và số phận chờ đợi tôi chẳng khác nào thảm họa tồi tệ nhất, không có lối thoát. Tôi nhất định phải tránh điều đó bằng mọi giá! Vậy nên cách duy nhất là có được sức mạnh áp đảo, thậm chí còn vượt xa cả nhân vật chính trong game và trở thành kẻ mạnh nhất!
description.pt-br:
Eu reencarnei como *Weiss*, o nobre que é um vilãozinho secundário do meu jogo favorito, e que está destinado a  própria ruína e morte.

Eu definitivamente preciso evitar isso de qualquer jeito!

Então, o que me sobra é conseguir um poder tão apelão que nem mesmo o protagonista ousará me enfrentar.

description.en: The stories of the everyday life of a black mage and a slime that run a magic store together as master and servant.

You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!
